title: Game-Based Workshop for Designing Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and advanced expertise in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, with participants focusing on designing Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) scenarios applicable to real-world science education settings.

learning_goals: Participants can concretely design technology-enhanced science learning scenarios through game-based activities.
Participants experience the transition to explicit learning design representations through group collaboration.
Participants can submit project deliverables outlining Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) activity plans executable in constrained technical environments.

resources: Card Game Kit (Including Learning Objective/Technical Tool/Assessment Method Cards)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
